title: Supreme Court Overturns Roe v. Wade, Eliminates Constitutional Right to Abortion
sub_head: The court upholds law from Mississippi that bans abortion after 15 weeks, opens door to widespread prohibitions on the procedure
body:
WASHINGTON—The Supreme Court eliminated the constitutional right to an abortion, overruling the 1973 Roe v. Wade decision and leaving the question of abortion’s legality to the states.
The court’s decision upheld a law from Mississippi that bans abortion after 15 weeks of pregnancy, roughly two months earlier than what has been allowed under Supreme Court precedent dating back to Roe.
